001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.shapes;
002
003public interface Shape2D extends Shape {
004
005    default int getDimensions() {
006        return 2;
007    }
008
009    int getWidth();
010
011    int getHeight();
012
013    static Shape2D of(Shape1D shape, int height) {
014        return of(shape.getLength(), height);
015    }
016
017    static Shape2D of(int width, int height) {
018        return new Shape2D() {
019            @Override
020            public int getWidth() {
021                return width;
022            }
023
024            @Override
025            public int getHeight() {
026                return height;
027            }
028        };
029    }
030}
